remainingProductLife.title: Remaining product life
remainingProductLife.description: Estimated remaining product life in months. Can be 'End of life' or 'Unknown'.

smokeSensorStatus.title: Smoke sensor status
smokeSensorStatus.description: The operational status of the smoke sensor

tempHumSensorStatus.title: Temperature/Humidity sensor status
tempHumSensorStatus.description: The operational status of the temperature and humidity sensor

maintenance.title: Maintenance status
maintenance.description: Indicates if maintenance has been performed

timeSinceLastMaintenance.title: Time since last maintenance
timeSinceLastMaintenance.description: Time elapsed since the last maintenance
